Road transport and haulage services

Express Logistics Transporting and Logistic Company provides road transport and haulage services to move liquid, flowable and hazardous substances, feedstuffs, finished products, construction materials and other types of cargoes with all modes of vehicles across Ukraine, EU countries and the CIS.

Combined transportation

Combined transportation is a multimodal shipment service with different modes of transport using maximum advantages of each of them. The choice of the transporting mode on the first road section is defined not only with the geographic location of the destination point but also with many other factors.

Expediting at ports

Marine transport operations are modern and economically efficient mode of commodities movement which allows shipping even of heavyweight and bulky cargoes to any point in the world. This transportation mode is especially valuable in cases when Client's priority is low cost of long distance transportation and supply traffic is of margin...
